long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Gatherer is a browser extension that helps you gather and view all the links and images from a webpage, It is available for chromium-based browsers like Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.
